website_summaries.verdict: Budget men's deodorant for people wanting a quick replacement stick.
pros: Provides a pleasant scent along with good sweat resistance during heavy use and activity
Feels lighter on the skin than other sports deodorants
cons: Doesn't last as long as the advertised 24 hours

customer_reviews.title: Smell isn't that great, def not for 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: Man, it's so hard to find the deodorant your looking for on here. You'd think one of the sellers would have this figured out by now. The number one comment on this product is that people get the dry stick confused with the blue gel kind. use a picture showing the product without the top part on and you'd make a bunch of people happy. Anyways, this stuff is alright but I'm giving a low rating due to poor product naming / labeling.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: White circular bottom piece keeps coming off when putting cover on!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to deodorant because it smells great and it works great. The only problem I have is the casing, thus the 4 stars. All the years I’ve been using this deodorant, this is the first time I am seeing this happen. At the bottom of the deodorant at the center, there is a white circular piece that keeps coming off every time you put the cover on due to the air traveling thru. It happened to all of the deodorants in the package. It probably didn’t glue well during production.
customer_reviews.author: William Ng

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: The best axe deodorant I've gotten to date. I've been wearing this particular line of deodorant for years as my skin is pretty picky on what I can apply, however, in the stores they only really sell 2 scents. When I found this online I bought it right away and my wife noticed immediately that the scent is stronger and lasts longer than the other ones (I work Construction). Love this stuff and will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Controller

customer_reviews.title: Irritation but good for most.
customer_reviews.text: Something in the new axe deodorant irritates me and causes a small rash. Luckily ivory cuts the deodorant from the skin. Otherwise I would love to use this for good. And it's funny I use to always use axe but now I do not believe I can much longer.
customer_reviews.author: AsWangs

customer_reviews.title: Using these for years, it's good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - No aluminum - Very light smell - Doesn't leave white residue on a shirt - No allergies Cons: - Doesn't last long - Will scratch you if not extra extended - Hard to wash off a freshly applied layer in case needed. ( I don't remember why but i needed to wash it off me once or twice ) Overall, i like it and been using it for YEARS! Amazon package is cost effective and you don't need to run to the store to get one.
customer_reviews.author: LoLa

customer_reviews.title: New formula - No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: New formula. These don’t smell like they used to. I bought the same pack a year or so ago and they changed the formula. They don’t last anymore like they used to. Will be returning or getting refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Fitzegibbons

customer_reviews.title: No staying power whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Of the many brands of deodorants and antiperspirants I've tried in my life, this one is the worst. It literally has a longevity of one or two hours tops. I thought this would be better than Old Spice, and the Axe scents seem more exotic, but it simply doesn't hold up to its claims. All-day fresh? 48 hour protection?? More like 48 minutes. The scent is pleasant enough when it first goes on, but you will find yourself reapplying constantly to continue smelling fresh. You are better off spritzing your armpit with cologne. A scratch and sniff sticker lasts longer than this rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the fact that these were not individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Husband used this brand and scent before, but after ordering on Amazon, he broke out in a rash under both armpits. Did not like the fact that these were not individually wrapped. Disappointed that we cannot return.the problem was a mix of deodorant and antiperspirant that he is allergic to was put in the package instead of the deodorant that was ordered....
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly long lasting great smell
customer_reviews.text: It's a different scent if you're tired of Phoenix, it's really nice though and it stays a good while. It's nice to have a deodorant that you randomly still catch a scent of it when your doing daily things or out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Gel didn't work for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using AXE deodorant forever and it didn't specify that it was the gel when I ordered it....thinking no big deal, it's all the same, right? He had the worst rash. I know others that have had the same problem and couldn't use it but I know a lot of others that love it....so there ya go!
customer_reviews.author: VtaGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all Axe products and this scent is his favorite. It has a perfume like scent and he finds that it lasts longer than the other deodorants. If a teenager can give it thumbs up you know it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Vyas

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I normally use the white powder deodorant stick but this one seems to work just as well. I like the smell and so does my wife so that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: JD and Kim

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok I wish you guys had more options in the aluminum free
customer_reviews.text: I like it but my family is right it kinda does smell like bug🕷 🐜 🐛 spray I wish there were more options for aluminum free purchases I hate going to Walmart or other stores and they don’t always have them anymore either
customer_reviews.author: OxoGin

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My two boys and my husband love this stuff. This price that I got it for her it was awesome and I would buy it again and again and again
customer_reviews.author: Gartlan

customer_reviews.title: Get a different Axe deoderant
customer_reviews.text: this deodorant doesnt even last for 24 hours. I use axe but this was the wrong product. Look for the other types that block sweating because those last for a full 2 days at least. I havent smelled my own body odor in such a long time and so thos deodorant clearly does not work well
customer_reviews.author: Rdrrdr

customer_reviews.title: Partner said this smelled like hamster bedding.
customer_reviews.text: I think the last think you want someone to tell you that your new deodorant makes you smell like a small animal bedding. Product was otherwise fine but crappy smell.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Krot

customer_reviews.title: This deodorant is fine. I generally don't like AXE product smells too ...
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant is fine. I generally don't like AXE product smells too well. This one isn't bad. It's not super strong like the Sprays, but it's still not a great scent either. As for a deodorant. It does work. It keeps the BO down etc. I gave it 4 stars sine it does do what it's supposed to. Would have been 3 if I was rating on smell alone.
customer_reviews.author: Steveb99

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPER ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SCENT EVERYWHERE SOLD OUT ONLY HAD OLD SPICE WHICH LEAVES SKIN BURNS, CJEAPER ON AMAZON THAN IN STORE
customer_reviews.author: Gervas79

customer_reviews.title: Decent, for the price
customer_reviews.text: The scent is great, but it effectiveness fades through the day. Overall not a bad deal, but if you want long lasting, you may want to consider antiperspirant.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Hayter

customer_reviews.title: Talk to the guy next to you
customer_reviews.text: How do you write a review an under arm deodorant I don’t know maybe ask the person next to me I haven’t had any complaints yet
customer_reviews.author: Mark lawler

customer_reviews.title: Apollo greatness!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Axe apollo. It doesn't irritate my skin at all and it being non-antiperspirant is an plus, as I don't want harmful chemicals. I don't sweat much either so it isn't needed. The only con is it doesn't last that long ( definitely not all day as it's advertised as )
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mei

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and effective
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand of deodorant. Granted I probably didn't save any money buying it online, they are great. No more having to hunt from store to store trying to find this particular type.
customer_reviews.author: Zinnie

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this specific deodorant for the past few years and it’s been great. I don’t know why but I prefer this scent over any of the others. My only complaint is that some of my white shirts have faint yellow rings around the armpits and I heard that it’s because of deodorant/anti-persperant.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great deorderent
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, but it was pricey on amazon. Ill probably go to the store next time to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ineffective as a deodorant
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product I was expecting. The axe solid deodorant I've bought previously has been white - this product is blue in color, smells different, and seems far less effective. At first I thought I'd forgotten to use it some days, but I eventually realized that this stuff just doesn't work very well. Unfortunately after the return window passed, so will sadly be discarding this.
customer_reviews.author: drewr

customer_reviews.title: Scent is too strong
customer_reviews.text: The scent with this is too strong for me, even with only a couple of strokes. I prefer the Dove Men's Care deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Thuong Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great  product  at a  great  price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Axe products so when I saw the awesome price on these, I bought them. I'm not noting the price because it has already changed. But I bought this deodorant at a great price- even cheaper than with a coupon at my local grocery store. The product works well and has a great scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Smells great great value
customer_reviews.text: This is not antiperspirant only deodorant. Passed on to my son though he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Dale H

customer_reviews.title: Very good deoderant
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder as I have used it before and like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Dale Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended and smells good too
customer_reviews.text: Been using the AXE Phoenix deodorant for 11 years little to say I like it and works well for me.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! An AXE fan!
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of AXE MENS deodorant! Aroma and freshness is long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Tarsitano

customer_reviews.title: Always a good go to
customer_reviews.text: Lasts all day, not overly strong. A great value pack.
customer_reviews.author: ID I Am

customer_reviews.title: solid.
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. what can i say, its a deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: aaron is online

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and smells great. Same price as in store.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent. Getting harder and harder to find in stores. Antiperspirant/deodorant
customer_reviews.author: Garry Uzzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to order a few than be searching at the big store and not find the scent you want
customer_reviews.author: SBK

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying a 4 pack before trying one out. This was not as good as old spice where the fragrance was strong. The fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying a 4 pack before trying one out. This was not as good as old spice where the fragrance was strong. The fragrance of this is very dull and isn't strong enough. I barely can smell a fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with skin irritation and redness/ slight pain and chafing ! I have used axe for many years but will no longer be buying thier products
customer_reviews.author: Daniel nilges

customer_reviews.title: Caused Chemical burns
customer_reviews.text: really did like the smell of this deodorant, so I was quite disappointed and alarmed when 2-3 days after first starting to use it, skin from under my arms started to peel off. at first it looked no worse than mild exfoliation, but the next day patches started to peel. USE WITH CAUTION.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Easy Shipping
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to order this on amazon and have it come to your door than making a run to the store. Fairly priced, plus added convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor James

customer_reviews.title: Eeehhh
customer_reviews.text: I usually go for white bars they last longer this came clear blue its still works for my son
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product scent and performance. The fact that it is deodorant and not anti-perspirant is appealing. The 4-pack offering can’t be beat. I will definitely buy again once these four are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Lance L.

customer_reviews.title: Lasting protection
customer_reviews.text: Works well for lasting protection and I like the smell. Id get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara camarena

customer_reviews.title: Not the Dry Version
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the dry version, not the wet which is this product
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Its a counterfeit it didn't smell like the Original Scent smelled more like Speed Stick that cost a dollar if I could give it a zero Stars I would complete waste of my time wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Murray

customer_reviews.title: Rockin' smell
customer_reviews.text: Cannot stop sniffing this deodorant. Bought it for my husband as a stocking stuffer. Smells very manly & much like a high quality cologne. Love, love it! Begging my husband to wear this versus his other deodorant. Keeps the sweat out... but you do have to apply it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Convenient 4 pack
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years. Easier to buy 4 pack and have them on hand than to remember to buy one when I’m almost out.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Hardell

customer_reviews.title: Good deodorant
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very good. I like gel deodorant because it doesn't go on too thick and doesn't leave stains.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, however stopped using after area became red

customer_reviews.title: Axe Deodorant Stick for Men
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply - doesn't leave crumbles. The smell isn't too strong.

customer_reviews.title: I am giving 4 not because it is a bad product, but i was expecting the white material ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 4 not because it is a bad product, but i was expecting the white material and not the blue more gel type.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Sedletsky

customer_reviews.title: Makes underarm smell like crap by eod
customer_reviews.text: Makes my underarm smells like crap by end of day. On days I use something else from another brand, underarm smells good by end of day
customer_reviews.author: McYemmy

customer_reviews.title: Not the white "Dry" Axe deodorant
customer_reviews.text: This is not the white "Dry" deodorant that Axe was selling under this name. This is now a blue stick which appears to be much closer to antiperspirant. I cannot use the blue type antiperspirant, only the dry, as these burn my skin. Beware when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: jlrat

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Lasts 10-12 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Lasts me thru the day. That's all I need
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought them from this seller sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have wasted soo much money on these. This is an amazing value. This is my favorite deodorant. I hate the white stuff. This goes on smooth and invisible, lasts all day and smells great. Don't even need cologne. Now I can get them half price!
customer_reviews.author: erikcarnegie217

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! This is my son's fave deo and was glad to find it in a bulk pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak.
customer_reviews.text: Weak. The antiperspirant variety lasts, but the deodorant...not so much. Tossed it after the second day. Didn’t “last”, as they like to say in that industry. And my days weren’t even active ones—just studying and writing.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Kanz

customer_reviews.title: The smell!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't seem to last as long as Old Spice!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Same as it always was
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, and it's still the same. I'll buy again when I need

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of these deodorants was not the same color or smell

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: When I applied it to my arm pit, jt started burning me. I have no idea why, but it burns so bad that I'm losing sleep because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevaun

customer_reviews.title: Getting hard to find in stores...
customer_reviews.text: Thought my wife was crazy buying me 4 but I can never find this secret t! Now I have one for the car and each bathroom. Cheaper than buying one by one at the store so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So you don't make kittens cry..
customer_reviews.text: Got here fast smells good and keeps me from stinkin'..Next time though I think I won't get the Apollo type, cause I hate waiting for the countdown before I can raise the product from the tube..

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Just what I asked for. No damage to product. Good price

customer_reviews.title: When you're looking for a good deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Works well, especially when you want to use a deodorant as opposed to antiperspirant. My skin is too sensitive for antipersperent, and the Phoenix deodorant last for a good portion of the day.

customer_reviews.title: $Recommend to purchase$
customer_reviews.text: Husband is happy with the smell and in general with Axe Deodorant.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day, I like the smell.
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say? It applies smoothly, I like this particular smell. Haven't been molested by hordes of women (yet), but I'll give it time. It lasts all day. Not much you can review on deodorant I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Cerulean Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find deodorant without antiperspirant
customer_reviews.text: I don't like deodorants with antiperspirant, but that is all you can find on the shelves in the stores. I like the scent of this deororant and it doesn't have antiperspirant so I'm glad I could find it here on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Worth It

customer_reviews.title: Colored Deodorant Doesn't Work For me
customer_reviews.text: I realize I may be the only person who feels this way, but colored deodorant doesn't work for me as well as white deodorant. I don't know if they have different chemicals or what, but this blue deodorant didn't do anything for me as far as keeping BO under control. I'm giving it a three-star review because I ended up giving these sticks to my older brother James, who was very grateful for them. As long as somebody's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Garrison Haines-Temons

customer_reviews.title: Missing the other 5 sticks of deoderant.
customer_reviews.text: I have only received one stick with this order. This was advertised as a 6 pack of 3oz. size. When will i receive the other 5 that I ordered. Thanks,Ron
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Axe Deodorant Stick, Apollo 3 oz
product_meta.description: Style:Apollo| Size:3 OunceAXE Deodorant Stick for Men, Apollo, 3.0 oz is part of the Apollo male grooming range from AXE. It is a classic, fruity fragrance featuring lavender, geranium and citrus. Its earthly composition and subtle blend of wood and fruit refresh the senses. AXE Deodorant Stick for men, Apollo 3.0 oz goes on smoothly to provide all day freshness and odor protection to keep you confidently fresh for longer. Apply a few strokes to washed and dried armpits. Wait a minute, get dressed and go. Boost your scent with AXE Body Spray for men 4 oz, get clean and fresh with AXE Body Wash for men 16 fl oz, and complete the range with AXE 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for men 12 fl oz – all available in Apollo. An AXE Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick for men 2.7 oz is also available in Apollo. The AXE Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick for men 2.7 oz provides 24-hour antiperspirant protection to keep you confidently fresh and dry for longer. And check out our other AXE Deodorant Sticks for men 3.0 oz scents like Phoenix, Black Chill, Dark Temptation, and Anarchy. FIND YOUR MAGIC with AXE Deodorant Stick for men Apollo 3 oz from AXE Grooming For Men.
feature_bullets: AXE Deodorant Stick for Men, Apollo, 3 oz provides all day freshness and odor protection to keep you confidently fresh for longer
A classically masculine, sophisticated fragrance with an addictive edge
Crisp notes of green fruits, sandalwood and fresh sage keep you smelling great
Goes on smoothly and provides all day freshness and odor protection
